experiences.title: Engineering Manager
description: Collaborated closely with product, design, and project management teams to architect and deliver enterprise software projects.
Simultaneously led multiple concurrent projects as a lead engineer, actively contributing to coding efforts for successful project delivery.
Guided the implementation of engineering processes and coding best practices while overseeing a diverse team of up to 9 engineers with varying levels of seniority.

experiences.title: Consultant, Engineering Courses
description: Demonstrated expertise in React, version control, and mobile development through contributions course material and assessments.
Wrote the assessment questions at the end of each course lesson to reinforce key concepts and evaluate comprehension of engineering courses.

experiences.title: Senior Developer
description: Lead developer for enterprise open source projects including discoveries for new builds, defining technical specifications, and leading the team through implementation.
Facilitated learning and growth opportunities for the team by creating training, mentorship and internship programs.

experiences.title: Supervisor, Web Services
description: Served as the lead engineer for the web services team responsible for ownership and architectural planning of more than 120 unique websites.

experiences.title: Manager, Web Content
description: Content manager for 5 eCommerce websites. Oversaw the relaunch of 2 eCommerce websites.

education.title: Bachelors of Science in Information Technology

projects.title: SEI Employee Benefits Portal
projects.description: Helped build an interactive employee portal that includes elements of a financial application using React and other modern front-end technologies. I worked closely with all team members on this project to coordinate releases, API calls, and feature roadmapping.

projects.title: MarketSmart Data Pipelines
projects.description: Completed an audit of their ETL data pipelines from beginning to end. This audit was in search for a root cause that was creating data drops. The pipeline began with an ecosystem of Wordpress sites, and processed through API Gateway and Lambda functions, ultimate into a frontend dashboard.

projects.title: Harvard College
projects.description: Conducted continuous maintenance activities and implemented new features for their Drupal and React build.

projects.title: White House Historical Association
projects.description: Collaborated closely with the White House team to ensure the ongoing maintenance and enhancement of their Shopify e-commerce platform. Acted as a strategic partner in devising feature roadmaps aimed at optimizing conversion rates.

projects.title: Penn State
projects.description: Our team executed a comprehensive overhaul of a Drupal and Gatsby decoupled project, starting from the initial idea and seeing it through to the final implementation. We collaborated to strategize and define all aspects, including components, layouts, and the backend framework to send data to the frontend.

projects.title: Vertex Inc
projects.description: Collaborated with the Vertex team to facilitate the delivery of feature enhancements, address technical debt, enhance documentation, and develop tailored campaigns to engage their target audiences.

projects.title: MagMutual
projects.description: Contributed to the ongoing performance maintenance and the development of new features for their decoupled React and Drupal website.

projects.title: NASDAQ
projects.description: Worked with the team to revise the quote detail pages for each company. Included a redesign of the layout and header to pull real time stock data from various api sources.

projects.title: Scholars Edge 529
projects.description: Complete redesign to a drupal build from conception to implementation. As a team, we planned all components, layouts, and backend structure. Implemented many highcharts to create visualizations of data for savings plans.

projects.title: Be Well, Work Well
projects.description: PwC sponsored a new platform development initiative aimed at assisting their employees in achieving their wellness objectives. We worked to establish a robust system for user management and goal planning to help their team achieve their wellness goals.

projects.title: Shirley Ryan Ability Lab
projects.description: Contributed to the ongoing performance maintenance and the development of new features for their decoupled React and Drupal website.

projects.title: TMNAS
projects.description: Performed a technical specification for a new underwriting application, including security concerns, architecture diagrams, and integration with multiple API sources.

projects.title: Visit the USA
projects.description: Contributed to the ongoing performance maintenance and the development of new features for their Drupal website.
